categories: Category:Imperial II-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Eviscerator was an Imperial II-class Star Destroyer under the command of Admiral Garrick Versio.

Under the command of Admiral Garrick Versio, the ship participated in the Battle of Endor, where it was part of the fleet defending the DS-2 Death Star II Mobile Battle Station from the coming Rebel assault. Although the Galactic Empire lost at Endor, with the destruction of the battle station and the death of the Emperor, Versio and the Eviscerator managed to escape, and retreat to the Jinata system. While orbiting Vardos, the admiral received a posthumous message from the Emperor about Operation: Cinder, which formed part of the Imperial Contingency plan.

The ship would later on take part in the Battle of Jakku where it was destroyed after suffering heavy damage while battling the New Republic Defense Fleet. Prior to its destruction, the ship was boarded by Versio's daughter, Iden, who fought her way to the bridge and attempted to convince her father to come with her. He refused and parted ways with Iden, who quickly rushed to an escape pod before the doomed ship exploded.
